mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your every financial whim is our top priority!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this right-I stroll into the fanciest restaurant in town, ready to impress my date with my platinum card. The matre d' tells me there's a waitlist. A waitlist?! The nerve. I demand to speak to the manager, and I make it crystal clear that I am the CEO of Bank of Entitlement. Suddenly, a table magically opens up, VIP treatment all the way. My date was impressed, and I couldn't help but feel totally justified in flexing my entitlement. That's the power of Bank of Entitlement, baby.
